In an unexpected announcement, Google CEO Eric Schmidt has announced that as of today he will be stepping down from the captain's chair and will be replaced by co-founder Larry Page. official blog, Eric Schmidt said When I joined Google in 2001 I never imagined-even in my wildest dreams-that we would get as far, as fast as we have today. Search has quite literally changed people's lives-increasing the collective sum of the world's knowledge and revolutionizing advertising in the process.
